Specific Details: Economic Connections between Galway and Chicago
DPOs Lobbied: Peter Keane|Councillor|Galway City Council::Leonard Cleary |Chief Executive Officer|Galway City Council::Albert Dolan|Councillor|Galway County Council
Subject Matter: Economic Connections between Galway and Chicago
Intended Results: To progress economic cooperation between Chicago and Galway
Lobbying Activities:
Galway Chamber was part of a delegation on a twinning visit to our sister city, Chicago, Illinois. Galway Chamber had an opportunity to engage in a number of exchanges with business and community organisations, including Chicagoland Chamber of Commerce, World Business Chicago, Enterprise Ireland, 167 Green/ Fulton Market District developers, Chicago Sister Cities International, MATTER Chicago, After School Matters, and the The Irish American Heritage Center (IAHC).
|Meeting|2-5
